sql-case.value: LOAD DATA INFILE '/temp/test.txt' INTO TABLE t_order
LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE '/temp/test.txt' INTO TABLE t_order
LOAD DATA INFILE '/temp/test.txt' INTO TABLE sharding_db.t_order
LOAD DATA INFILE '/tmp/test.txt' INTO TABLE t_order FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' LINES STARTING BY 'xxx'
LOAD DATA INFILE '/tmp/test.txt' INTO TABLE t_order IGNORE 1 LINES
LOAD DATA INFILE 'file.txt' INTO TABLE t1 (column1, @var1) SET column2 = @var1/100;
LOAD DATA INFILE 'file.txt' INTO TABLE t1 (column1, @dummy, column2, @dummy, column3);
LOAD DATA INPATH '/user/hive/data.txt' INTO TABLE t_order
LOAD DATA LOCAL INPATH '/home/user/data.txt' INTO TABLE t_order
LOAD DATA INPATH '/user/hive/data.txt' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE t_order
LOAD DATA LOCAL INPATH '/home/user/data.txt' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE t_order
LOAD DATA INPATH '/user/hive/logs/' INTO TABLE log_table PARTITION (dt='2025-07-11')
LOAD DATA LOCAL INPATH '/home/user/region_logs/' INTO TABLE log_table PARTITION (dt='2025-07-11')
LOAD DATA INPATH '/user/hive/updates/' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE stats PARTITION (category='sales')
LOAD DATA LOCAL INPATH '/home/user/partition_data/' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE stats PARTITION (category='sales')
LOAD DATA INPATH '/user/hive/orc_data/' INPUTFORMAT 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcInputFormat' SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcSerde' INTO TABLE orc_table

LOAD DATA LOCAL INPATH '/home/user/parquet_data/' INPUTFORMAT 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.parquet.MapredParquetInputFormat' SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.parquet.serde.ParquetHiveSerDe' INTO TABLE parquet_table

LOAD DATA INPATH '/user/hive/partitioned_orc_data/' INPUTFORMAT 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcInputFormat' SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcSerde' INTO TABLE orc_partitioned_table PARTITION (dt='2025-07-12')

LOAD DATA LOCAL INPATH '/home/user/partitioned_parquet_data/' INPUTFORMAT 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.parquet.MapredParquetInputFormat' SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.parquet.serde.ParquetHiveSerDe' INTO TABLE parquet_partitioned_table PARTITION (region='north')

LOAD DATA INPATH '/user/hive/overwrite_orc_updates/' OVERWRITE INPUTFORMAT 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcInputFormat' SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcSerde' INTO TABLE orc_partitioned_table PARTITION (dt='2025-07-12')

LOAD DATA LOCAL INPATH '/home/user/overwrite_parquet_data/' OVERWRITE INPUTFORMAT 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.parquet.MapredParquetInputFormat' SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.parquet.serde.ParquetHiveSerDe' INTO TABLE parquet_partitioned_table PARTITION (region='south')
